entry.value: select norm. techn. and %%00010graphs for testing%%00010%%00010graphs can be found %%00010in the _outputs_ folder %%00010of the workflow

Testing of different normalization methods (median, quantile, loessF), as well as of normalization performed previously in DIA-NN. It is possible to visualize both the normalized and not normalized data using several types of plots (violin plots, MA plots, correlation clustermaps...). These plots are saved in the _outputs_ subfolder inside the folder for a given KNIME project. It is also possible to visualize only a certain subset of the data, e. g. only replicates of a given sample.%%00010It is also necessary to run previous Sample name extraction results of which will be used for calling the required columns within the metanode.%%00010Within the metanode, it is also possible to change certain plot parameters for all types of plots. The metanode needs to be disconnected before changing these parameters.%%00010%%00010The main purpose of this metanode is to assist with the automated generation of figures used for the different normalization approaches quality control and selection of an appropriate normalization method. The selected normalization approach should be selected in the Data normalization metanode.%%00010%%00010=================%%00010%%00010Used programs and tools and their respective licenses at the time of the metanode creation.
